title: Motivational Interviewing-Based Workplace Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Targets administrative/managerial professionals needing improved workplace interaction skills; blended learning with digital devices (tablets/laptops).

learning_goals: Learners can identify peers' problem-solving motivation with over 80% accuracy by applying motivational interviewing techniques
Learners can apply at least three MI techniques (open-ended questions, positive reinforcement, change exploration) tailored to counterparts' openness levels in mathematical problem situations
Learners can perform responses aligned with motivational interviewing principles at 70% or higher accuracy during 5-minute role-play assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
